overview: Patrick Cassady serves as Vice President of Global Sales for ENXSuite and is charted with driving rapid growth of ENXSUITEâ€™s international business as well the continued successful expansion of the North American and United Kingdom regions. He brings two decades of executive and senior level sales and field operations experience that includes leadership positions within both publically traded and privately held bellwether technology enterprises. Most recently, he was VP Sales at Rearden Commerce, a market leader in spend management, and has had sales leadership roles at CA, Remedy, Sybase, ISS and Aspect Communications, and startups. Patrick has an impeccable record of accelerating customer acquisition and revenue growth in all aspects of international sales and field operations. Patrick is a life-long resident of Los Gatos, CA and holds a Bachelor of Arts degree in Telecommunications and Sales from Pepperdine University.

relationships.title: Vice President of World Wide Sales & Service
